de.ityx.contex.util.datatransfer

Class IDMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ityx.contex.util.datatransfer.IDMapper

  • public class IDMapper
extends Object
    This class is for ICat and IDIG and more, to hold references from classes to Contex_tns and ICat_boosterblinds and more.
    Author:
    heim
